original_title: Trump tells Zelensky to ‘show flexibility’ — RT World News
article_summary: US President Donald Trump has received an invitation to visit Moscow from Russian Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov, following a summit with Russian President Vladimir Putin in Alaska. Trump expressed interest in the visit but acknowledged potential backlash. The leaders discussed ways to resolve the Ukraine conflict and normalize relations between Moscow and Washington. Trump also urged Ukrainian President Vladimir Zelensky to show flexibility in negotiations.</s>
